live_updates: Power has been restored and services are back online. Thanks for your patience and understanding.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected area. Once hydro is restored, services in the area should begin working.
Hydro continues to work to restore power.

This interruption is related to a power outage in the area. Our technicians are working to restore service as soon as power has been restored. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates as they become available.
